flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: You mainly need a basic knowledge of sewing to do this. I'm a novice and if I can do it, so can you!
guide.introduction_rendered: You mainly need a basic knowledge of sewing to do this. I'm a novice and if I can do it, so can you!
guide.summary: What better night for germ warfare than Halloween? With some cheap fleece, a little time and good reference images you too can be a germ!
guide.title: Good Evening Ladies and Germs!
